item.title: Best Books I read in 2020
item.description: Best books I read in 2020 Almanack of Naval Ravikant by Eric Jorgenson Easy to read and full of good quotes. I especially loved the parts about happiness. You might not even recognize that happiness is a valid goal in life. And it can have enormous impact on other aspects of your life. It’s free https://www.navalmanack.com. The best book I’ve ever read. Oxygen by Nick Lane A tremendous book that will change your perspective on cell biology and possibly make you think about how you can live your life to better protect your cells.

item.title: Impressum
item.description: Data protection I take the protection of personal data very seriously. Therefore, I keep confidentiality subject to German and EU law and to this declaration. General and required information Responsible for this website Responsible for this website is: Markus Barthlen Markenbildchenweg 23-25 D-56068 Koblenz +49 1515 4168580 wichtig (at) barthlen.de What are your rights? You have the right to get information about the data saved by me, to correct errors, to delete the data, to block the data from being processed and to oppose the processing of data.
